title: Men's Tops and Bottoms
textBeforeTable: Craft Size chart 1 year Manufacturer Warranty: cycling Recommended Use: polyester, mesh Material: 1 back Pockets: mesh panels Venting: Tech Specs Small back pocket doubles as a stow pocket Reflective print for safety in low light Ultra-lightweight construction makes pocket-stuffing possible The Craft PB Featherlight Jacket stuffs easily in your jersey pocket when the sun finally warms your afternoon spin. The polyester Craft PB Featherlight Jacket features an ergonomic cut for in-the-saddle comfort, while the wind-protective material keeps you from freezing. Slim construction prevents flapping on the descent and the small back pocket carries an extra set of gloves for when the weather really starts to change. Description Item
textAfterTable: How to Measure: For best results, take measurements over your underwear. Chest: Measure under your arms, around the fullest part of your chest. Natural Waist: Measure around your natural waistline, keeping the tape a bit loose. Hip: Measure around the fullest part of your body at the top of your legs. Inseam: Using pants that fit well, measure the crotch seam to the bottom of the leg. Sleeve: Measure from your neck to your wrist with arms held out.
